backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister placeholder with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of the HP Partner First Silver badge card from the Certifications component, with high confidence and a reference to the affected file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short human-readable summaries describing each component's purpose and current state.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point for the frontend; currently empty.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'HIZMET IT Services' and mounting the app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full single-page layout by rendering Header, Hero, Services, Products, Certifications, AMC, and Footer in order.
frontend/src/components/AMC.tsx: Renders the Annual Maintenance Contract section as a centered card listing three AMC benefits with checkmark icons.
frontend/src/components/Certifications.t: Displays the 'Certifications & Partnerships' section heading and a placeholder message stating no certifications are currently listed, after the HP badge card was removed.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing company address, multiple contact numbers and email, business hours, and business credentials (UDYAM, GST, GeM Seller ID) in a four-column grid.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with the company logo, desktop nav links, and a collapsible mobile menu that smooth-scrolls to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with a full-width background image, headline, description, and two CTA buttons for calling and scrolling to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products section rendering three hardware product cards (laptops, desktops, peripherals) each with an image, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section displaying five IT service offerings (hardware repairs, printing, networking, data recovery, software) in a responsive card grid without images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor via React Query, using the current Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties (oklch color tokens) for the design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with oklch-based color tokens, custom fonts, border radii, shadows, and accordion animations, plus typography and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state metadata for the HIZMET IT Services certificate design project, recording a completed feature to remove the HP Partner Silver badge from the Certifications component.
